channel.title: Hyperion Run Help
channel.description: On my computer, all of the hyperion typed servers does not run. It says cannot find the main class. But I checked all of the code of the run.bat, all are correct paths. Anyone help?

item.title: Hyperion Run Help
item.dc:creator: @Silentmic2 Silentmic2
item.description:
@Silentmic2 wrote:

Nothing is opened except the IDE and my browser

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Run Help
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Silentmic2, post:3, topic:454220”]I get this when using IDE

Aug 15, 2012 11:08:23 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 80... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:251) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:48) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.registerHandles(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:523) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.access$200(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:65) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor$Acceptor.run(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:407) at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservingRunnable.java:64) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

The source used is BattleField RuneScape.[/quote]

Do you have another server open? something is already binded to your port

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Run Help
item.dc:creator: @Silentmic2 Silentmic2
item.description:
@Silentmic2 wrote:

I get this when using IDE

Aug 15, 2012 11:08:23 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 80... Aug 15, 2012 11:08:25 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:251) at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.NioSocketAcceptor.open(NioSocketAcceptor.java:48) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.registerHandles(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:523) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.access$200(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:65) at org.apache.mina.core.polling.AbstractPollingIoAcceptor$Acceptor.run(AbstractPollingIoAcceptor.java:407) at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservingRunnable.java:64) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

The source used is BattleField RuneScape.

item.title: Hyperion Run Help

item.description:

Use an IDE, it is able to run your server without shitty batch code.
